original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 290.50/291.00 to US dollar, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bonds ended steady on Monday, dealers said while the Spot US dollar closed at 290.50/291.00 rupees, dealers said.
The Spot US dollar closed at 291.75/292.50 rupees on Friday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 24.65/70 percent steady from 24.70/90 percent a day earlier, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 25.30/26.25 percent up from 25.75/26.25 percent a day earlier.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2025 closed at 26.30/27.30 percent, up from 27.00/30 per cent at last close.
